name: cox
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the person who sits in the back of a rowing boat and controls its direction: Coxes are often small, light people.

to act as a cox: She coxed for her college for three seasons. He coxed the winning eight.

an abbreviation for cyclooxygenase: an enzyme that causes a chemical reaction in the body, one of the results of which is pain and inflammation (= red, painful, swollen areas). There are two different kinds of COX, COX-1 and COX-2: COX-2 inhibitors
